action.msg: Aight, I see you. You're pretty okay.
For a melon, that wasn't too bad!
Oh, uh- y'know, cause I wasn't aware that... you guys could talk and all.
Nice save.
Haha, you were about to lose your title.
Tea... you're doing it again.
Fever Town?
Uh, don't worry about it. Just a place nearby...
Huh. Maybe I'll check it out after this. Anyway, you ready for another song?
Wait... you're not gonna-
(Oh yeah! He doesn't know about the rule. This'll be a calm day for once!)
Ahem,. I mean, yeah sure let's go for another song!
Try to keep up with me! You were super slow last song!
What do you mean? I thought I did fine-
Pfft, you call those rhymes fine?
Out of all people, I didn't expect a talking melon to make fun of your flow.
You mean his LACK of flow.
Whatever man. You're lucky I'm just...
Just what?
Yo! Snap the fuck out of it!
What's up with you today?
